title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4220.6 - Interest in partnership
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4220.6 - Interest in partnership

State Regulations

No statement of partnership which proposes by ownership
or lease, to control the racing qualities of any horse will be accepted unless
the proportionate interest of each such partner is at least 25
percent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4220.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
